entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
